introduction: Below are a few other projects I’ve had fun working on. Some are digital, some are not.

paragraphs.paragraph: Resn teamed up with Y&R New Zealand to create McWhopper.com. The custom Tumblr experience was an open letter from Burger King to McDonald's, detailing every aspect of the Peace Day plan, from the co-branded designs to the recipe for the McWhopper itself.

A synthesis of the restaurants’ signature burgers, the McWhopper combined the the best of the mouth-watering Whopper and the iconic Big Mac. The campaign hinged on the public wanting this burger, so we had to make it look as delicious as possible.
With over 2 billion web impressions and over 700,000 users on the website in the first 48 hours, the response exceeded all expectations. McWhopper was a huge win for Burger King and for Peace Day.

Customize an E-TEC G2 by selecting its horsepower and designing its color scheme. Rotate the engine for a complete 360° view of the final result. Once you’ve perfected the design, you can download a dynamic PDF of your engine’s specifications and share it on social media.

Dynamic camera movements take you through an animated sequence that shows the full extent of the engine, inside and out. So as you journey through the site, the engine moves with you, revealing new angles and layers that show-off its breakthrough design.

With 264 frames in the About sequence, our challenge was to provide a high-quality experience with minimal wait time. Before we let users in, we load the first frame in high-resolution and half the other frames in medium-resolution. Afterward, we continue to improve the frame quality in the background.
